pkgmetadata.longdescription: Chromatographic File Converter // Reads chromatograms from binary formats into R objects. Currently supports conversion of 'Agilent ChemStation', 'Agilent MassHunter', and 'ThermoRaw' files as well as various text-based formats. Utilizes file parsers from external libraries, such as 'Aston' https://github.com/bovee/aston, 'Entab' https://github.com/bovee/entab, and 'ThermoRawFileParser' https://github.com/compomics/ThermoRawFileParser.
